document.id: Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council Res. No. SI-R20-019
document.heading: PUEBLO DE SAN ILDEFONSO COUNCIL RESOLUTION NO. SI-R20-019
Amendment to the San Ildefonso Services, LLC Member's Representatives Compensation Act of 2019
document.preamble: At a duly called meeting of the Council of San Ildefonso Pueblo on the 29th day of September, 2020, the following Resolution was adopted:

recital.text: the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Pueblo') is a sovereign and self-governing Tribe, recognized as such by the United States of America; and,

the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Pueblo") has approved Articles of Organization ("Articles") to establish a business corporation called, San Ildefonso Services, LLC ("SIS"), to engage in federal contracting and to conduct other business ventures; and,
in accordance with the Articles, SIS is governed by a Board of Directors comprised of five Members, called "Member's Representatives"; and,
the Council has determined that SIS will benefit from the selection of experienced and well-qualified Member's Representatives to help develop and manage successful business ventures; and,
the Council and Governor have selected five new Member's Representatives to oversee and direct the activities of SIS; and,
Article X, Section A of the Articles call for the Member's Representatives to be compensated at a rate established by the Council.
that the Council hereby enacts the attached law entitled the "AMENDMENT TO THE SAN ILDEFONSO SERVICES, LLC MEMBER'S REPRESENTATIVES COMPENSATION ACT OF 2019."

procedural-data.text: The foregoing resolution was duly voted upon by the Council on September 29, 2020, at a meeting with a vote of 10 in favor, 0 opposed, 0 abstaining and 0 absent (Governor presiding and not voting) pursuant to the authority vested in the Council by the Agreement of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso.
DELIVERY OF THE RESOLUTION TO THE GOVERNOR:

Resolution No. SI-R20-019 was presented to the Governor of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso on the 30th day of September, 2020, pursuant to the Governing document of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Agreement"), GOVERNOR, Sec. 4(c), and will become effective after signature by the Governor or veto override by the Council.

attachment.heading: AMENDMENT TO THE SAN ILDEFONSO SERVICES, LLC MEMBER'S REPRESENTATIVES COMPENSATION ACT OF 2019

section.heading: Short Title
section.text: This enactment shall be known as "AMENDMENT TO THE SAN ILDEFONSO SERVICES, LLC MEMBER'S REPRESENTATIVES COMPENSATION ACT OF 2019" ("Amendment").

section.heading: Purpose
section.text: The purpose of this Amendment is to increase the rate of compensation for the five Member's Representatives serving on the SIS Board.

para.text: The Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Pueblo") has approved Articles of Organization ("Articles") to establish a business corporation called, San Ildefonso Services, LLC ("SIS"), to engage in federal contracting and to conduct other business ventures; and,
In accordance with the Articles, SIS is governed by a Board of Directors comprised of five Members, called "Member's Representatives"; and,
The Council has determined that SIS will benefit from the selection of experienced and well-qualified Member's Representatives to help develop and manage successful business ventures; and,
The Council and Governor have selected five new Member's Representatives to oversee and direct the activities of SIS; and,
Article X, Section A of the Articles calls for the Member's Representatives to be compensated at a rate established by the Council.

section.heading: Amendment
section.text: Section 17.2.21.040 of the San Ildefonso Services, LLC Member's Representatives Compensation Act of 2019 is hereby amended to read as follows:

include.text: "The Council hereby establishes the rate of compensation for each SIS Member Representative at two-hundred fifty dollars ($250.00) per month which will be covered by the San Ildefonso Services, LLC annual budget. "

section.heading: Establishment of the Rate of Compensation
section.text: The Council hereby establishes the rate of compensation for each SIS Member Representative at two-hundred fifty dollars ($250.00) per month which will be covered by the San Ildefonso Services, LLC annual budget.
Section 17.2.21.050 of the San Ildefonso Services, LLC Member's Representatives Compensation Act of 2019 is hereby repealed.
